Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Nidovirales Infections/Coronaviridae Infections/Coronavirus Infections
Record.Description: Virus diseases caused by the CORONAVIRUS genus. Some specifics include transmissible enteritis of turkeys (ENTERITIS, TRANSMISSIBLE, OF TURKEYS); FELINE INFECTIOUS PERITONITIS; and transmissible gastroenteritis of swine (GASTROENTERITIS, TRANSMISSIBLE, OF SWINE).
